def wave_sort(a):
    a.sort()
    last = len(a) - len(a) % 2
    a[1::2], a[:last:2] = a[:last:2], a[1::2]

def wave_sort(a):
    pivot = 0
    while pivot < len(a):
        max_val = max(a[pivot:])
        max_val_index = a[pivot:].index(max_val)
        tmp = a[pivot]
        a[pivot] = max_val
        a[max_val_index+pivot] = tmp
        pivot += 1
        
        if pivot < len(a):
            min_val = min(a[pivot:])
            min_val_index = a[pivot:].index(min_val)
            tmp = a[pivot]
            a[pivot] = min_val
            a[min_val_index+pivot] = tmp
            pivot += 1

def wave_sort(a):
    a.sort()
    [a.insert(i+1, a.pop(i)) for i in range(len(a)) if i%2==0]
    return

def wave_sort(a):
    s = a[:]
    f = [max, min]
    for i in range(len(a)):
        v = f[i%2](s)
        a[i] = v
        s.remove(v)
